text: The 2020 Taiwan Mulan Football League season is the 7th season of the Taiwan Mulan Football League, the top division of women's football in Taiwan. The regular season began on 11 April and will end on 7 November 2020. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Team ! Location ! Stadium !
